api_list.name: Get Eortologio
api_list.description: Get todays, tommorows and the day after tommorow's names
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://giortes.p.rapidapi.com/giortes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "giortes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get deployed API version
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://giortes.p.rapidapi.com/version"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "giortes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://giortes.p.rapidapi.com/version"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
